original_title: PJ MASKS: WE CAN ALL BE HEROES
overview: National Superhero Day is April 28 and we're celebrating early with the PJ Masks! You and your little hero can wear your pajamas to watch Catboy, Owlette, and Gekko take on their toughest missions yet and discover what really makes a hero.
title: PJ MASKS: WE CAN ALL BE HEROES
